title: GoLow Golf: Masters Preview and Best Bets, Tiger Return Buzz
itunes:title: GoLow Golf: Masters Preview and Best Bets, Tiger Return Buzz
description:
John previews the The Masters, the unique buzz surrounding Tiger's return to Augusta after a devastating leg injury, and what are realistic expectations. Then, it's thoughts on the rest of the field and best bets and Tiger talk with Action Network's Jason Sobel. Also, listener mailbag questions!

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
